rules.name: ForcePoint DLP - Standard Sensitive Data Detection
rules.summary_expression: ForcePoint DLP Threat with a severity of {{severity}}
rules.description_expression: Alerts when Forcepoint DLP fires its built-in Standard Sensitive Data Detection policy (e.g., credit cards, SSNs, banking/health IDs) on outbound traffic or file movement—indicating potential sensitive-data exfiltration or policy violation.
rules.expression:
metadata_vendor="Forcepoint" AND 
metadata_product="Forcepoint DLP" AND
!isEmpty(fields["cat"]) AND
(contains(fields["cat"],"Standard Sensitive") OR fields["cat"] = "Personal Files")
